channel.title: 602 problem
channel.description:
I had run Mysql and Apache on my xampp.
I also runned my server and got this error: Debug On? yes Server version [601]. SQLException: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO) SQLState: 28000 Server Online on Port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at com.hotyute.communications.sqlprotocol.ItemInfo.validate(ItemInfo.jav a:22) at com.hotyute.PowerHouse.<init>(PowerHouse.java:30) at com.hotyute.Main.main(Main.java:14) Jul 9, 2010 6:57:21 PM com.sun.grizzly.Controller logVersion INFO: Starting Grizzly Framework 1.9.18-e - Fri Jul 09 18:57:21 CDT 2010
Then I logged on and got "Error connecting to server"
Anyone got ideas?

item.title: 602 problem
item.dc:creator: @davidh123456 davidh123456
item.description:
@davidh123456 wrote:

I had run Mysql and Apache on my xampp.

I also runned my server and got this error:
Debug On? yes
Server version [601].
SQLException: Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: NO)
SQLState: 28000
Server Online on Port: 43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.hotyute.communications.sqlprotocol.ItemInfo.validate(ItemInfo.jav
a:22)
at com.hotyute.PowerHouse.(PowerHouse.java:30)
at com.hotyute.Main.main(Main.java:14)
Jul 9, 2010 6:57:21 PM com.sun.grizzly.Controller logVersion
INFO: Starting Grizzly Framework 1.9.18-e - Fri Jul 09 18:57:21 CDT 2010

Then I logged on and got “Error connecting to server”

Anyone got ideas?

Read full topic
